This is an INSANE collection of Scientology books. Not only does it have (what seems to be) EVERY official Scientology course/levels, it also has a vast collection of L.R. Hubbard's books, AND popular anti-Scientology e-books mixed in. 

This is EXACTLY what Scientologists never wanted, people having freedom to exchange infromation on self improvment and spiritual guidance for FREE. SEED THIS PEOPLE! THE SCIENTOLOGY NOOBS NEED TO KNOW WHAT THEY ARE GETTING INTO! AND with this collection of books, an open minded outsider can make a fair judgment as to just how well scientology's mind sharpening/honing skills really work.
